channel.title: Posts on Vincenzo goes to Datahood
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vincenzo goes to Datahood

item.title: Where to start?
item.description: Where do you start when you have humanities complete knowledge at your fingertip? I wanted to learn more about data - but how? I felt overwhelmed, and still do. And it is totally okay. We need time to adjust and sort things out. I started with the basics of the fundamental languages used for data tasks - SQL and Python - paired with expert interviews. It helped me to understand where I stand, where I want to go and how the road ahead is looking.

item.title: First blog post ever
item.description: Hello out there, this is my first post. This is the start of a wonderful learning journey full of ups and downs, new insights and learnings. The name of this blog is based on the UK band “Frankie goes to Hollywood”. So, relax, take a seat and enjoy the ride. ðŸŽ¢

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi there, I am Vincenzo and this is my journey into Data. From being a consultant for haute couture brands in Paris, analyzing data for the biggest european ecommerce platforms in Berlin, I already made some stops. Over the last years I learned how to think like a product manager and gained hands-on full stack web development skills, just to find my true passion now. I am a true lifelong learner and a true autodidact.
